current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_1: Santa Ana River bottom, 2 miles S/W of Colton
case_circumstances: White male adult found hanging from a willow tree in the river bottom, 2 miles southwest of Colton, CA.  Designated "John Doe #02-1915", he was described as being about 45-50, 5'10" to 5'11", 150 to 160 lbs, chestnut brown hair, slightly balding.  Identity can only be established by DNA.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_with_body: Clothing found hanging on tree: Tan overcoat/raincoat (dealer label: "Ransom & Salsbee," San Antonio, Texas), a gray hat (dealer label: "Joske Bros. Co Department Store," San Antonio, Texas), a shirt with collar and tie.
case_footwear: No description of pants or shoes.
case_other_items_with_body: Also present at the scene was a cane, described as a "heavy hickory walking stick."
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
